text: Everybody dreams. At least at some point in their live.
Everbody wants to achive something big. Something nobody did before.
But do we even remember when we stopped?
This is Adam. A small boy with big dream.
Adam wants to be an adventurer. But where to start?
How one become adventurer? What does adventure really need?
Adam thinks, that this question is simple. Adventurer needs 3 things: a weapon, a backpack and a companion.
So that is were Adam;s story starts. But how will it end? Will the Adam achive his dream? Or stop dreaming, like the rest of us?
That is up to you. So go on. Dream, if you dare!
